metadata.description: This new bi-monthly series features characters from the Grimm Universe in never before told stories. Issue #1 ties directly into the 2012 annual and the Grimm Angel One-Shot. As the Flesh Reavers descend on the people of earth an unlikely alliance forms between a trio of Highborns who have only recently discovered their powers. In order to save the humans they defend...and themselves...they'll have to master their powers in the heat of a life or death battle without any margin for error.
metadata.name: Grimm Universe
